title: Keyboard overlaps sign button if you tap on sign after changing "Recipient" or "Asset" field on Send Transaction screen

labels.name: core-ui-grooming
labels.description: To be reviewed on the next core ui grooming to add the issue to team board and set priority

body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug
*Summary*: when you change  "Recipient" or "Asset"  after setting an amount and tapping Back, at attempt to sign transaction keyboard remains opened and overlaps "sign" button.

#### Expected behavior
no overlapping

#### Actual behavior
![photo_2019-07-29 11 09 11](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4557972/62036044-4f77d980-b1f1-11e9-8f1a-87ffd144a97f.jpeg)


### Reproduction


- Open Status
- Go to wallet -> send
- Set recepient, asset, amount
- Change recepient or asset
- Try to sign transaction


### Additional Information

[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
- Status version: nightly 29/07/2019, release 0.14.0 (build 16)
- Operating System: iOS
cc @rachelhamlin

This also happens when I initiate a Tx from the wallet in general. ðŸ˜•
It's a blocker for v 0.14 so I'm adding a regular `release` label as well.

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done

You're approved @bshevchenko!
@rachelhamlin thanks! I'm having issues with project installation, trying to reach https://chat.status.im/ but no luck (even via VPN). Is it down or something?

https://chat.status.im/ isn't actually live @bshevchenko; we're developing for mobile only right now.

Take a look at this quick start and see if it helps you? https://status.im/build_status/status_react_quickstart.html

@rachelhamlin with this quick start I have the same problem:

```
copying path '/nix/store/b9zbysdvs1djwg6c54gf8bxnvy3iqmlp-tzdata-2018g' from 'https://nix-cache.status.im'...
copying path '/nix/store/nf6zg5ha82nh1561a1l97w6ky4n2pn0a-xz-5.2.4' from 'https://nix-cache.status.im'...
error: build of '/nix/store/0f47hb96ikir1vway0imyyjsb2pk6jfz-status-go-develop-76d184b-ios.drv', '/nix/store/2j1kdh49d83ax37z42fq5gqjdj6nxh75-stdenv-darwin.drv', '/nix/store/2v54skp2jfm9c0ij4p5d4cirxxirzjb2-file-5.35.drv', '/nix/store/5grmn503lbiz1ca6pfcsvhas6prj13ry-StatusIm-Mobile-0.0.1.drv', '/nix/store/800l2ps3lb5dblbzf6jz2q89f89xha5k-unzip-6.0.drv', '/nix/store/9dlbv23rxb3lbr0n4k0b3xc49bxp4a67-curl-7.64.0.drv', '/nix/store/a0aix5lvz46rd50sc11ixm8cqhnx09vn-jq-1.6.drv', '/nix/store/f2xc8zp7znaannj9q9byy3zksrwg37rj-git-2.19.2.drv', '/nix/store/f458d7k73p245c2zmq55ys0z2aa4i8fj-leiningen-2.8.3.drv', '/nix/store/fwxlb9x9ghfh3gh1876sjxwg082y6m66-clojure-1.10.0.411.drv', '/nix/store/h4hx8b16pk3fvk2afr9dg28kd5ma2xij-ruby-2.5.3.drv', '/nix/store/k8q3yla32j4r5cjcbgz8x2ba1xmsbbnh-nodejs-10.15.0.drv', '/nix/store/l0ssijbwz3bdl0axhjd6wvir4l0ls7h8-python-2.7.15.drv', '/nix/store/m7s9yfma68lmxqslyllaqq1hn8q7rhn3-ps-1003.1-2008.drv', '/nix/store/n02kb7qpjblh0ccb917xra9j8v0j8dkc-bundler-1.17.2.drv', '/nix/store/r91yssj1panwy2wwj3sgg28qpyci27h4-cocoapods-1.5.3.drv', '/nix/store/scqbidqr61njcfv4qzj4gw3pjpd0jy2q-apache-maven-3.6.0.drv', '/nix/store/sn9zxjphg1x7231yv4n4x42mc5g02hav-yarn-1.13.0.drv', '/nix/store/x4r8g7s3jlp0x7f7rz4awspngk3g1f64-procps-1003.1-2008.drv', '/nix/store/x6cn2pzrjkcbnbln04vmsihk5mmmjayg-wget-1.20.1.drv', '/nix/store/x9w7zd9lb2fnk9vgf7dkmyf10m4xx4r4-lsof-4.91.drv', '/nix/store/yy455b8l7yck3g11yz8baiq7n1g3ia9h-watchman-4.9.0.drv' failed
make: *** [Makefile:304: _startdev-ios-simulator] Error 1
```

it's the end of the log file
where's the best place to get help on this?
@rachelhamlin it happens to me on the very firsrt command `make startdev-ios-simulator`
@bshevchenko the log you pasted doesn't seem to contain the reason for the error. Can you please create a gist of the complete log?
@PombeirP https://gist.github.com/bshevchenko/ffa2aa2c33de0a3025227ff0fc1af28e
@PombeirP I'm on macOS mojave 10.14.6 (18G87)

OK, the issue is here:

```
hash mismatch importing path '/nix/store/22xhg1i229h2ngiwz5j2w1f2f606rynw-ruby2.5.3-ruby-macho-1.2.0';
  wanted: sha256:0p6kidp6p61i03jq82fc6049bbg3s0c7n7zyibmxvz1b7kx5sk8k
  got:    sha256:18x66j0sjnikwzzfv4zk77k3g8igy51iflf49mqljhl0wll6vnlm
```

We're being occasionally bitten by this issue, and still don't have a fix for it. Maybe you can the following:
1. Ensure you are on latest develop (or rebased on it);
1. try running `nix-store --delete /nix/store/22xhg1i229h2ngiwz5j2w1f2f606rynw-ruby2.5.3-ruby-macho-1.2.0` and try running `make startdev-ios-simulator` again?
1. If that doesn't work, I'd try cleaning the whole Nix store by running `make nix-purge` (all required archives will be re-downloaded).

@PombeirP thanks, but 2 didn't help

`keiras-iMac:status-react bruce$ make nix-purge
sudo rm -rf /nix ~/.nix-profile ~/.nix-defexpr ~/.nix-channels ~/.cache/nix ~/.status .nix-gcroots
Password:
keiras-iMac:status-react bruce$ make startdev-ios-simulator
-bash: /Users/bruce/.nix-profile/bin/make: No such file or directory`

How to build project after `make nix-purge`?

@bshevchenko Hello from Gitcoin Core - are you still working on this issue? Please submit a WIP PR or comment back within the next 3 days or you will be removed from this ticket and it will be returned to an â€˜Openâ€™ status. Please let us know if you have questions!
* [x] reminder (3 days)
* [ ] escalation to mods (6 days)

Funders only: Snooze warnings for [1 day](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8657/3431?snooze=1) | [3 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8657/3431?snooze=3) | [5 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8657/3431?snooze=5) | [10 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8657/3431?snooze=10) | [100 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8657/3431?snooze=100)

> @PombeirP thanks, but 2 didn't help
> 
> `keiras-iMac:status-react bruce$ make nix-purge sudo rm -rf /nix ~/.nix-profile ~/.nix-defexpr ~/.nix-channels ~/.cache/nix ~/.status .nix-gcroots Password: keiras-iMac:status-react bruce$ make startdev-ios-simulator -bash: /Users/bruce/.nix-profile/bin/make: No such file or directory`
> 
> How to build project after `make nix-purge`?

Hmm, I haven't seen that before. Are you by any chance running this from inside a Nix shell? You should be in a regular OS shell, not inside a Nix one.
@PombeirP @gitcoinbot regular OS shell

@bshevchenko what I find strange is that `make` is pointing to `/Users/bruce/.nix-profile/bin/make` (mine is pointing to `/usr/bin/make`). Maybe the best is to start the setup procedure again from the beginning (i.e. run `sudo rm -rf /nix ~/.nix-profile ~/.nix-defexpr ~/.nix-channels ~/.cache/nix` and run `make run-android` again, from a new shell)
@PombeirP and again no luck :( https://gist.github.com/bshevchenko/78d4f35c64d2df01c244710c322e6d5d
